body_html:
@eryshev

  1. For distributed training, yes. 'TF_COFNIG' is required to set each job up.
  2. I am not sure I understand your question. But fir local training, you don't have to set 'TF_CONFIG'. For distributed training, 'TF_CONFIG' is required for all tasks including ps. But for ps, it is a just standard tensorflow server and the common practice is that it should be CPU-only machines.
